casebody.data:
Melissa APPERSON and her husband, Justin Cox, Plaintiffs
v.
INTRACOASTAL REALTY CORPORATION, Melissa Gallison, individually and as broker in charge of Intracoastal Realty Corporation, Keith Beatty, individually and as an Agent and/or Employee of Intracoastal Realty Corporation, and Ed Coulburn, Individually and as an Agent and/or Employee of Intracoastal Realty Corporation, Kendall Fowler, and his wife, Tabitha Fowler, Defendants No. COA18-147 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: September 18, 2018

AFFIRMED.
